subject.normal: [wtp-dev] Any plans to move to a newer build of 3.2.1?

headers.subject: [wtp-dev] Any plans to move to a newer build of 3.2.1?

body.para: <span style='font-size:10.0pt; font-family:Arial'>We are currently using M20060802 build of the Eclipse 3.2.1 code stream. Are there any plans to move to a newer version? I have a bug that Iâd like to fix for 1.5.1 that depends on a fix in JDT thatâs available in builds newer than M20060810.
